mapper.select: SELECT a.no as appointmentNo, a.date as appointmentDate, b.name as patientName, b.rrn as patientAge, b.gender as patientGender, a.remarks as appointmentRemarks, a.status as appointmentStatus, c.name as doctorName FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN patient b on a.patient_no = b.no LEFT JOIN employee c on a.employee_no = c.no;

SELECT a.no as appointmentNo, a.date as appointmentDate, b.name as patientName, b.rrn as patientAge, b.gender as patientGender, a.remarks as appointmentRemarks, a.status as appointmentStatus, c.name as doctorName FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN patient b on a.patient_no = b.no LEFT JOIN employee c on a.employee_no = c.no WHERE a.patient_no = #{no};

SELECT a.no as appointmentNo, a.date as appointmentDate, b.name as patientName, b.rrn as patientAge, b.gender as patientGender, a.remarks as appointmentRemarks, a.status as appointmentStatus, c.name as doctorName FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN patient b ON patient_no = b.no LEFT JOIN employee c ON employee_no = c.no WHERE b.name = #{patientName};
